Ha! I predicted this correctly! In years of discussions about microservices and how it helps solve the org problem, we never stopped to wonder if the (bloated) org *itself* is the problem. But now that CEOs are convinced companies are overstaffed and org charts need culling ðŸ˜‰

content.value:
Ha! I predicted this correctly!

In years of discussions about microservices and how it helps solve the org problem, we never stopped to wonder if the (bloated) org *itself* is the problem.

But now that CEOs are convinced companies are overstaffed and org charts need culling ðŸ˜‰
